mapper.insert: insert into news_article(adminId, departmentId, newArticleContent, newArticleHTMLContent, newArticleTitle, newArticleTabloid, newArticleDate) values (#{adminId}, #{departmentId}, #{newArticleContent}, #{newArticleHTMLContent}, #{newArticleTitle}, #{newArticleTabloid}, #{newArticleDate})
mapper.select: select * from news_article order by newArticleDate desc
select * from news_article where newImageName != 'news_default.png' limit 3;
